entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • vscode shows metadata names in document outline #78072
  • Suppression via preprocessor directive is considered unnecessary for some diagnostics #78073
  • ShebangDirective should be unconditionally parsed #78054
    Next
  • enclose parentheses issues #78053
  • C#: Autosuggest in XMLDOCS suggests signatures that will not match after insertion when using nullable annotations with generics #78052
  • Cleanup after https://devdiv.visualstudio.com/DevDiv/_workitems/edit/2441480 is fixed #78050
    18.0
  • Crash compiling extension static method #78042
    Next
  • Configure Roslyn's usings quickfix to ignore certain namespaces #78040
    Backlog
  • Re-enable TransitiveVersionPinning for RoslynAnalyzers folder #78036

Closed

  • InvalidOperationException when using field keyword in a struct with 2+ fields #77909
    17.14

PullRequests

Created

  • Stop producing 32-bit NGEN Images for VS #78074
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Implement custom awaitable support #78071
    Feature - Runtime Async
  • Simplify internal analyzer api #78070
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Remove EditorFeatures from OOP #78069
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update RoslynAnalyzer package projects with dependencies #78068
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Generate documentation - update API shape #78067
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Driver generics3 #78065
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • [release/dev17.14] Fix crash in backing field nullability cycle scenario #78055
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Field Keyword, 17.14
  • Move MiscellaneousFilesWorkspace construction to background thread #78051
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove EditorFeatures reference from ServiceHub #78043
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Make Razor redirect code more robust #78039
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Update PublishData.json after VS span to main #78049
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Localize exception messages for gladstone/roslyn integration #78063
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Update gladstone/roslyn api #78057
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Reapply "Remove the ProjectDiagnosticAnalyzer type (#77899)" (#77969) #77970
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Simplify channel-processing code in SemanticSearch. #78060
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Unseal LSP types #78041
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Support concurrent gladstone extension unloading #78056
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Semantic Search: Add support for async queries and FAR tool #77906
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Disable TransitiveVersioningPinning for RoslynAnalyzers. #78037
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix crash in backing field nullability cycle scenario #77993
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure external access extensions package gets codebase #78030
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Extensions: ref safety analysis #77967
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged, Next
  • Update dependency versions #78048
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Remove dependency on EditorFeatures from build tools #78047
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • [main] Disable TransitiveVersioningPinning for RoslynAnalyzers. #78038
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Remove dependency on EditorFeatures from codelens layer #78045
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove dependency on EditorFeatures from lsp tests #78044
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add unit tests for gladstone extension handling service. #78034
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Improve detection of code whose updates may not have effect #78009
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode
  • Expression trees: support optional arguments and named arguments in parameter order #77972
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Update `RuntimeHelpers.Await` rules #77957
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Runtime Async
  • Update ignored directives public API #77968
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Feature - Ignored Directives
  • Switch to using field+auto-prop #76906
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add stubs for semantic model apis needed by IDE #77448
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge EditorFeatures.WPF into EditorFeatures #77707
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • WIP: Remove source generator diagnostic reporting from Workspace #76863
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update resourceManagement.yml #77948
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add support for FieldRva to EnC delta #78033
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Bind compound assignment operator declarations #77999
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Feature-UserDefinedCompoundAssignmentOperators
  • Implement support for triggering Fix All from additional files #74695
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Execute core compiler from full framework msbuild #77914
    Area-Compilers
